channel.title: Homes on Ayman A. Amin
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Ayman A. Amin

item.description: About me I am currently working as An Assistan Professor of Statistics at Faculty of Commerce, Menoufia University, Egypt. Before that, I worked as A Tutor for Statistics and Mathematics for about two years (from February 2012 to June 2014) at Faculty of Science, Engineering and Technology, Swinburne University of Technology, Australia. Moreover, I worked as A Teaching Assistant for Statistics and Mathematics for about three years (from May 2007 to April 2010) at Faculty of Commerce, Menoufia University, Egypt.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I teach the following courses for undergraduate students: Applied Mathematics. Principles of Statistics. Applied Statistics. Quantitative Analysis. I teach the following courses for Postgraduate students: Advanced Statistics Theory of Statistics Mathematics for Statisticians Demography
